patthana15.52:4.1: Noupādānaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.52:5.1: Upādānaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.52:6.1: Nokilesaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
